definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane

sentences.english: Remember repeat business is why you are in business.
sentences.chinese: 記得你是舊地重遊，所以生意。

sentences.english: Go, let the old ground with me once.
sentences.chinese: 走吧，陪我舊地重遊一次吧。

sentences.english: One day at a certain time, to return.
They revisit mutual haunts and mutual friends.
sentences.chinese: 他們會重回舊地，或者走訪一些雙方共同的朋友。

sentences.english: It feel strange to is visiting the place again after all these year.
sentences.chinese: 時隔多年，舊地重訪使人感到很新奇。

sentences.english: Here we are again, Its like a dream, but this is real to me (yeah)
sentences.chinese: 現在咱們舊地重遊，如夢一場，但這都是真的。

sentences.english: It feels strange to BE visiting the place again after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 時隔多年，舊地重訪使人感到很新奇。

definition: the people are gone and the place is empty (idiom)/the sight of a deserted place brings old friends to mind/the place is deserted/the birds have flown
to restore old way/to return to the past
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
ready to start on sth/about to act
to inspect one by one/to list individually
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
to cater to sb to make them happy (esp. of one's parents)
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
